title: How to Get Unlimited Studs in Lego Batman for Ds

steps.headline: Gain access to Arkham Asylum.
steps.description: You can gain access to this part of the Batcave by completing Chapter 1 (The Bullion Dollar Riddle), Level 1 (Ice Cream Factory).

steps.headline: Enter Arkham Asylum.
steps.description: Just go to the door to the right of Chapter 3.

steps.headline: Go to the left and up 2 flights of stairs.
steps.description: You will find these stairs about 2 feet (0.6 m) from the entrance you just came in.

steps.headline: Change to Clayface.
steps.description: Look for Clayface. He might be behind one of the doors, or walking around. Each time it changes.

steps.headline: Find the break-in.
steps.description: Pull each lever and destroy everything in each room until you find bricks to build.

steps.headline: Build the needed materials.
steps.description: Once you have discovered the bricks to build, build the button and step on it. A barrel will roll out of the wall and explode. Build two handles from this.

steps.headline: Access the break-in.
steps.description: With Clayface, hold A and press down on the D-Pad. The wall will crumble, and you may enter.

steps.headline: Build the lever.
steps.description: Blow up the computer to the left, then build a lever out of it.

steps.headline: Enter the "code".
steps.description: Pull the lever, then step on the 4 panels in the middle of the room.

steps.headline: It's raining studs!!
steps.description: The wall will shoot out boxes that will explode into BLUE studs!! Get them quick before they disappear!

steps.headline: IMPORTANT!!
steps.description: Leave the room and return to the Batcomputer. Wait a few minutes, and REPEAT for your desired amount of studs! !

text: Gain access to Arkham Asylum. You can gain access to this part of the Batcave by completing Chapter 1 (The Bullion Dollar Riddle), Level 1 (Ice Cream Factory). Enter Arkham Asylum. Just go to the door to the right of Chapter 3. Go to the left and up 2 flights of stairs. You will find these stairs about 2 feet (0.6 m) from the entrance you just came in. Change to Clayface. Look for Clayface. He might be behind one of the doors, or walking around. Each time it changes. Find the break-in. Pull each lever and destroy everything in each room until you find bricks to build. Build the needed materials. Once you have discovered the bricks to build, build the button and step on it. A barrel will roll out of the wall and explode. Build two handles from this. Access the break-in. With Clayface, hold A and press down on the D-Pad. The wall will crumble, and you may enter. Build the lever. Blow up the computer to the left, then build a lever out of it. Enter the "code". Pull the lever, then step on the 4 panels in the middle of the room. It's raining studs!! The wall will shoot out boxes that will explode into BLUE studs!! Get them quick before they disappear! IMPORTANT!! Leave the room and return to the Batcomputer. Wait a few minutes, and REPEAT for your desired amount of studs! !
